progressionDescription:
Besides more [HP] , Class Features and Proficiency Bonuses. Gaining a higher level also grants you access to more perks, increases your [AP] and allows you to have higher Attribute values. In this table below, you can see the general bonuses received as well as the [XP] required to hit that level.
You gain the following benefits every time you [LEVEL] up.
  • You gain 2 Attribute Points
  • You can select two Perks
Additionally, every 30 000 [XP] after [LEVEL] 12, you gain an additional Attribute Point and can choose a new Perk. However, your [LEVEL] does not increase.
perksDescription: Perks are class agnostic improvements that make your character better in various ways. A character can choose a perk at [LEVEL] 1 and each time their [LEVEL] increases. Any Perk can be choosen as long as the Character meets all the requirements of the Perk. Additionally Perk can only be choosen once unless it has the repeatable tag
